This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] defaultbutton: select should match :hover and :active when interacting with button.
  assert_equals: appearance:base-select must be supported in order to run this test. expected "base-select" but got "auto"
[FAIL] defaultbutton: select should not match :hover or :active when interacting with elements in the picker.
  assert_equals: appearance:base-select must be supported in order to run this test. expected "base-select" but got "auto"
[FAIL] custombutton: select should match :hover and :active when interacting with button.
  assert_equals: appearance:base-select must be supported in order to run this test. expected "base-select" but got "auto"
[FAIL] custombutton: select should not match :hover or :active when interacting with elements in the picker.
  assert_equals: appearance:base-select must be supported in order to run this test. expected "base-select" but got "auto"
